cluster_0.title: KPMG global tech report: Technology insights
cluster_0.theme: The tech sector's digital transformation is driven by targeted investments in AI and ESG, prioritizing profitability while maintaining a democratized approach to AI experimentation.  This approach is influenced by employee feedback and a focus on achieving sustainable and social responsibility goals.

cluster_0.title: KPMG global tech report: energy insights
cluster_0.theme: The energy industry is undergoing a significant digital transformation, driven by the need to balance renewable energy adoption with energy security.  This requires strategic technology investments, particularly in AI and cybersecurity, while addressing data maturity gaps to maximize value and manage risks.

cluster_0.title: India CX Report'25: Consumer Durables
cluster_0.theme: The evolution of appliances into smart devices is transforming how we live, emphasizing the importance of understanding customer needs to drive value.

cluster_0.title: India CX Report'25: Real Estate
cluster_0.theme: The real estate industry is undergoing a transformation driven by innovation, sustainability, and evolving community needs.

cluster_0.title: KPMG global tech  report: Healthcare insights
cluster_0.theme: The healthcare industry is undergoing a digital transformation, leveraging AI and other advanced technologies to improve operations, reduce costs, and enhance patient experiences.  However, challenges remain, including cybersecurity concerns, skills shortages, and transformation fatigue.

cluster_1.title: Navigating Reserve Bank of India’s guidelines for NEFT and RTGS payment systems
cluster_1.theme: This report from KPMG India analyzes the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) guidelines for NEFT and RTGS payment systems, focusing on the regulatory requirements for access criteria, cybersecurity, and annual system audit reports.

cluster_1.title: Draft DPDP Rules: Guidance to DPDP Act implementation
cluster_1.theme: This document provides guidance on the implementation of the Digital Personal Data Protection Rules, 2025 (DPDP Rules), in India, focusing on key areas such as data breach notification, consent management, security safeguards, and cross-border data transfers.  It aims to help businesses comply with the new regulations and build a more secure and privacy-conscious environment.

cluster_1.title: Evolving third party landscape in India's media and entertainment industry
cluster_1.theme: This report analyzes the evolving third-party landscape in India's media and entertainment industry, highlighting the significant risks and opportunities associated with the sector's digital transformation and emphasizing the importance of robust third-party risk management for sustainable growth.

cluster_1.title: Expected Credit Loss (ECL)
cluster_1.theme: This KPMG report examines the implementation of the Expected Credit Loss (ECL) framework under IFRS 9, IND AS 109, and ASC 326, highlighting key challenges, impacted areas, and best practices for financial institutions.

cluster_1.title: Internal Risk Assessment guidance for money laundering/terrorist financing risks
cluster_1.theme: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) issued comprehensive guidelines on internal risk assessment for money laundering, terrorist financing, and proliferation financing, aiming to streamline the process and align Indian financial institutions with international standards.

cluster_2.title: Management Capability Development Index (MCDI) India 2024 Report
cluster_2.theme: The 2024 KPMG-AIMA Management Capability Development Index (MCDI) India report reveals the urgent need for resilient, empathetic, and future-ready leadership in India, highlighting key strengths and weaknesses across ten dimensions of management capability.

cluster_2.title: KPMG 2024 CEO Outlook
cluster_2.theme: The KPMG 2024 CEO Outlook survey reveals Indian CEOs' optimistic outlook on global economic growth, driven by AI adoption and a return to in-office work, while also highlighting concerns about cybersecurity, ethical AI implementation, and ESG challenges.

cluster_2.title: You can with AI
cluster_2.theme: KPMG helps clients leverage the power of artificial intelligence (AI) for business transformation, offering strategic guidance, implementation support, and insightful reports to unlock AI's potential.

cluster_2.title: KPMG global tech report – industrial manufacturing insights
cluster_2.theme: The KPMG Global Tech Report 2024 highlights the significant progress of industrial manufacturing firms in digital transformation, particularly in AI adoption, while also identifying areas needing improvement, such as supply chain and data integration.

cluster_2.title: KPMG global tech report 2024
cluster_2.theme: The KPMG Global Tech Report 2024 emphasizes the need for a balanced approach to technology investment, prioritizing evidence-based decisions and a strategic approach to maximize value while mitigating risks associated with speed and security.

cluster_3.title: Sustainable packaging in the FMCG and retail sector
cluster_3.theme: This article examines the growing need for sustainable packaging within the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) and retail sectors in India, focusing on the integration of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into packaging strategies and the implementation of circular economy principles.

cluster_3.title: Electronics Component Manufacturing Scheme
cluster_3.theme: The Indian government launched the Electronics Component Manufacturing Scheme, a 230,000 crore INR initiative to boost domestic electronics manufacturing, attract investments, and create jobs.

cluster_3.title: Making the case for global workforce migration
cluster_3.theme: This report examines the potential for global workforce migration to address labor shortages in developed countries and leverage India's demographic dividend.  It provides policy recommendations to facilitate this migration, addressing barriers such as skill mismatches, regulatory hurdles, and cultural differences.

cluster_3.title: Indian family offices – the new investors for India’s startup ecosystem
cluster_3.theme: Indian family offices are increasingly investing in India's startup ecosystem, driven by diversification strategies, access to new technologies, and the potential for high returns.  This symbiotic relationship benefits both family offices and startups.

cluster_3.title: 2025 Emerging Trends in Infrastructure and Transport: The Great Reset
cluster_3.theme: The article discusses the significant and disruptive changes impacting the infrastructure and transport sectors in 2025, emphasizing the need for visionary leadership, collaboration, and bold decision-making to navigate these global shifts.

cluster_3.title: India’s digital dividend: The strategic roadmap towards becoming a global digital leader
cluster_3.theme: This report examines India's digital transformation, focusing on how the convergence of technology, talent, and collaboration can drive inclusive and resilient economic growth.  It highlights India's strategic initiatives and positions the country as a global leader in the digital age.

cluster_3.title: India CX Report'25: Airlines
cluster_3.theme: The article analyzes customer experience in the Indian aviation sector, highlighting key factors influencing passenger satisfaction and brand loyalty, particularly focusing on pre-flight, in-flight, and post-flight stages.  It emphasizes the importance of exceeding customer expectations to foster loyalty and drive premiumization.

cluster_3.title: The rise of silver generation: Transforming the senior living landscape
cluster_3.theme: This article examines the burgeoning senior living sector in India, highlighting the significant demographic shift towards an aging population and the opportunities and challenges this presents for the country.  It emphasizes the need for innovative solutions, policy changes, and public-private partnerships to develop a sustainable and inclusive senior living ecosystem.

cluster_3.title: Aviation leasing and financing ecosystem at GIFT IFSC, India
cluster_3.theme: This report analyzes the current state and future potential of commercial aircraft leasing in India, focusing on the role of the GIFT IFSC in fostering growth within the aviation sector.

cluster_3.title: Food and Nutritional Security in India
cluster_3.theme: India's food security challenges and potential solutions are analyzed, highlighting the need for a multi-pronged approach involving policy reforms, technological advancements, and sustainable agricultural practices to achieve zero hunger.

cluster_3.title: Enabling infrastructure changes through policies for growth of EVs
cluster_3.theme: This report examines the crucial role of infrastructure development in accelerating the adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) in India, emphasizing the need for comprehensive policy support and collaboration among stakeholders to create a supportive ecosystem.

cluster_4.title: Third-party risks in the pharmaceutical supply chain
cluster_4.theme: The pharmaceutical supply chain faces significant risks, including bribery, counterfeiting, fraud, and regulatory non-compliance, impacting operational efficiency and public health.  Mitigating these risks requires robust due diligence and adherence to regulatory standards.

cluster_4.title: Financial Crime Bulletin
cluster_4.theme: The article discusses the evolving landscape of financial crimes, highlighting the increasing sophistication of methods used and the global regulatory responses to combat them.  It emphasizes the role of technology, both in facilitating crimes and in providing tools for detection and prevention.

cluster_4.title: Forensic lens on related parties and transactions
cluster_4.theme: The article discusses the increased scrutiny of related party transactions (RPTs) in the corporate landscape and emphasizes the importance of a forensic lens to mitigate associated risks.

cluster_5.title: Top geopolitical risks 2025
cluster_5.theme: The report analyzes the five most pressing geopolitical challenges that organizations will face in the near term, offering insights on how businesses can adapt and innovate to mitigate risks and capitalize on opportunities.

cluster_5.title: Cybersecurity considerations 2025
cluster_5.theme: The report examines the evolving cybersecurity landscape in 2025, focusing on the impact of AI and the need for organizations to adapt their strategies and build resilience.

cluster_5.title: A new age of cybersecurity culture
cluster_5.theme: This report explores how artificial intelligence (AI) can be leveraged to improve cybersecurity culture within organizations by enhancing visibility, efficiency, quantification, personalization, and scalability of security measures.  It highlights the challenges organizations face in building a robust cybersecurity culture and proposes actionable steps to harness AI's potential in addressing these challenges.

cluster_5.title: Intelligent retail
cluster_5.theme: This report explores the transformative impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on the retail sector, providing a strategic framework for organizations to effectively leverage AI solutions, enhance customer experiences, and achieve a significant return on investment.

cluster_5.title: India CX Report'25: Hotels
cluster_5.theme: The article discusses the impact of artificial intelligence on the hospitality industry and emphasizes the need for hoteliers to focus on facilities and service levels to enhance customer experience.

cluster_6.title: Revolutionising traffic management and road safety with AI-powered intelligent traffic management system (ITMS)
cluster_6.theme: KPMG in India implemented a cutting-edge Highway Traffic Management System (HTMS) using AI to address traffic congestion, accidents, and safety issues on expressways, resulting in improved efficiency and safety.

cluster_6.title: Enhancing efficiency and effectiveness in policing with the crime and criminal tracking network and systems (CCTNS)
cluster_6.theme: KPMG India's significant contribution to upgrading and scaling India's Crime and Criminal Tracking Network Systems (CCTNS) project, leading to improved policing efficiency and effectiveness through digital transformation.

cluster_6.title: Establishing and operationalising the revenue augmentation and analytics cell
cluster_6.theme: KPMG India helped a state government in India significantly increase its revenue through a comprehensive asset monetization and revenue enhancement strategy, improving governance and operational efficiency.

cluster_7.title: Agentic AI in the human capital management (HCM) industry
cluster_7.theme: PwC leverages Oracle's Agentic AI to enhance Human Capital Management (HCM) across various HR functions, improving efficiency, decision-making, and employee experience.

cluster_7.title: India CX Report'25: Financial Services
cluster_7.theme: The article briefly discusses Hemant Jhajhria's professional experience and expertise in consulting, particularly within the consumer goods and financial services sectors, highlighting his role in leveraging AI for business transformation.
